#Required libraries
```{r}
library(RPostgreSQL)
library(tidyverse)
library(dbplyr)
```

#Load the very basic function
```{r,echo=TRUE}
source("get_data_SQL.R")
source("get_data_API.R")
```

#Use the function to get the data via SQL
```{r}
dataSQL <- get_data_SQL(data)
```

#Use the function to get the data via API
```{r}
dataAPI <- get_data_API(r="826", p="710,724,757,276", ps="201001,201101,201201,201301", freq="M",maxrec=100000)
```
